p: The sample of skin containing dermis and hypodermis was isolated, carefully trimmed with cutter, and fixed in 10% neutral formalin solution. After paraffin embedding, 3- to 4-Î¼m sections were taken and stained with hematoxylin and eosin for study of tissue appearance. Three indices were measured, the length epithelial tongue, the epithelial gap, and the area of granulation tissue as shown in Figure 2I. All slides were observed under light microscopic.
